content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position (x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5) waiting for source items
- Burner inserter (position x=41.5, y=-78.5) with no fuel

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (x=60.0, y=-60.0) with no ingredients

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5) working
- Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0) with no fuel
- Steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5) not connected
- Pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5) empty
- Pipe group (position x=105.5, y=-32.5) with full output

### Transport system at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of a belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5) empty
- Transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5) working
- Transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5) working

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors due to lack of fuel
- Ensure that burner mining drills and burners have a sufficient fuel supply to operate.
- Regularly check the fuel levels of boilers and steam engines to prevent them from running out of fuel.

### Errors due to missing ingredients
- Ensure that stone furnaces have the necessary ingredients to operate.
- Regularly check the inventory of the agent to ensure that it has the necessary items to craft or mine.

### Errors due to entities not being connected
- Ensure that steam engines are properly connected to the power grid to function.
- Regularly check the connections between entities to prevent errors due to disconnections.

### Errors due to entities not being plugged into the electric network
- Ensure that electricity groups are properly plugged into the electric network to function.
- Regularly check the connections between entities and the electric network to prevent errors due to disconnections.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined or invoked by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned by the agent.
